Interface PizzaFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChicagoPizza, NYPizza
public interface PizzaFactory
The PizzaFactory interface defines methods for creating different types of pizzas. Implementing classes must provide specific implementations for each pizza type.
Author:
Nithya Konduru, Dhyanashri Raman

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Pizza
    createBBQChicken()
    Creates a BBQ Chicken pizza with predefined toppings, crust, and size.
    Pizza
    createBuildYourOwn()
    Creates a "Build Your Own" pizza that allows customization of toppings, crust, and size.
    Pizza
    createDeluxe()
    Creates a Deluxe pizza with predefined toppings, crust, and size.
    Pizza
    createMeatzza()
    Creates a Meatzza pizza with predefined toppings, crust, and size.

      Creates a Deluxe pizza with predefined toppings, crust, and size.
      Returns:
      a new Deluxe pizza.

      Creates a Meatzza pizza with predefined toppings, crust, and size.

      Returns:
      a new BBQ Chicken pizza.

    • createBuildYourOwn

      Pizza createBuildYourOwn()
      Creates a "Build Your Own" pizza that allows customization of toppings, crust, and size.
      Returns:
      a new customizable pizza.
